animeTitle: Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D
animeDescription: Kenji Kamiyama and Production I.G's Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex: Solid State Society movie will be converted into stereoscopic 3D. Kamiyama himself is overseeing the conversion, and I.G will also add a newly animated opening sequence.
animeRelated: ['Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society', 'Koukaku Kidoutai: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society 3D - Tachikoma na Hibi']
